alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 9:05AM CST until January 09 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow will continue to be an issue in open country as wind gusts up to 40 mph linger through noon. Wind speeds will gradually drop off this afternoon. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central, and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...Until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Expected locally reduced visbility in blowing snow and drift prone areas in open county.
info.instruction: Travel is generally discouraged this morning across most of south central Central and north central Kansas. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
